subsistence.translation[0].definitions[0: the condition of only just having enough money or food to stay alive
Many of the families are forced to live at the subsistence level.
The land provided subsistence and little more.
subsistence.translation[1].definitions[0: a small amount of money or food that is just enough to survive on
Refugees are dependent for subsistence on support from aid agencies.
Unfortunately, these people have become used to living at subsistence levels (=with just enough food etc to survive).
Foreign workers are paid subsistence wages by local standards.
subsistence.translation[1].definitions[1: farming in which farmers produce just enough food for their families to live on
